name: Arachnophobia VR
description:
The concept of this game is that you are seated on a chair in your office and have spiders on your table, the number of movement of them will change according to the level you are presented.

This was my first real unity project that I took until the end.

It was done  for a course of computer engineering from Aveiro University.

This was done inside a project that had a scope of helping people deal better with their phobias.

This has a companion app that will connect to a heart rate sensor and the levels should evolve based on that, p.ex. it would only change to the second level if the heart rate was less then x for x time (this is disabled on this version to fully see the levels).

The most difficult part of it was the movement of the spiders. Assets from the asset store where used.
